author: Robin Marx
description:
Joe R. Lansdale is your favorite horror writer’s favorite horror writer. Widely anthologized and the recipient of no fewer than ten Bram Stoker Awards, it doesn’t feel accurate to characterize the prolific East Texas author as underrated, per se, but to this reader it has long felt like Lansdale should be much more of a […]

The post REVIEW: The Essential Horror of Joe R. Lansdale by Joe R. Lansdale appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Essential Horror of Joe R. Lansdale by Joe R. Lansdale
